Kirk Herbstreit trends after Tom Brady reveals he cloned his beloved dog

Using blood collected before Lua's passing, biotech firm Colossal Biosciences, in which Brady is an investor, facilitated the cloning. This revelation has sparked widespread debate among fans and celebrities, touching on themes of love, loss, and the ethical implications of advanced technology.

description: Rama Duwaji, wife of mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani, has been a quiet but impactful force behind his campaign. The Syrian-American artist shaped the campaign's visual identity and digital strategy, offering crucial creative support while remaining largely out of the public eye. Her influence has been instrumental in crafting Mamdani's modern, grassroots appeal.

title: After $12.6 billion Amazon stake cut, Jeff Bezos' ex-wife MacKenzie Scott makes one of her biggest donations
description: MacKenzie Scott has gifted Howard University a remarkable $80 million, one of its largest donations ever, bolstering diversity and equity initiatives. This substantial, unrestricted contribution will aid student aid, infrastructure, and operations, arriving at a crucial time for the institution. Scott's ongoing philanthropic spree includes significant gifts to other DEI causes and a reduction in her Amazon holdings.

title: Charlise Springer breaks silence after Blue Jays' World Series heartbreak
description: The Toronto Blue Jays' World Series dream ended in heartbreak, but George Springer's wife, Charlise, offered a message of gratitude and pride. Her words highlighted the team's resilience and the lasting memories created, reminding fans that baseball's true value lies in connection and shared moments, not just wins. The team vows to 'run it back' next season.

title: Brittany Mahomes slams “disgusting” Bills fan stunt ahead of Chiefs vs Bills
description: Ahead of the Chiefs-Bills game, a past incident involving Brittany Mahomes and a fan display in Buffalo has resurfaced. She publicly condemned a disrespectful Kermit the Frog puppet mocking Patrick Mahomes, urging for basic decency. This reminder of respect underscores the intense rivalry, proving that even amidst fierce competition, human dignity remains paramount.

title: Vanessa Bryant recalls Kobe’s heartbreaking moment with daughter Gianna Bryant
description: Vanessa Bryant is releasing a photo book, 'Mamba & Mambacita Forever,' featuring cherished memories of Kobe and Gianna Bryant. She shared a touching moment from the 2009 NBA Finals, where Kobe cradled a young Gigi, his focus solely on his daughter's pride. The book aims to preserve these heartfelt moments for the world to remember.
